conversation.Question:
Which of the following options correctly identifies the defects in the image?
(A)Stain(B)slice(C)scratch(D)screen separation(E)no defect.
conversation.Reasoning: My analysis based on this image is as follows:Rejection reasons: (A) Stain - no discoloration or liquid residue present. (B) Slice - no deep cuts or separation of material observed. (D) Screen separation - no gaps or lifting of the screen layers detected. (E) No defect - clear presence of scratches invalidates this option. Anomaly region coordinates [[(452,198),(547,503)],[(792,532),(998,758)],[(1167,263),(1496,207)],[(1461,458),(1585,763)]] The defect type is scratch. Scratches are visible as linear marks on the surface of the screen disrupting the uniformity Likely cause: Physical contact with a sharp object causing superficial damage to the screen's protective layer. The answer is (C).
